title: Whose God? Whose Land?: The Great Empires and The Making of the Modern Middle East
description: WHOSE GOD? WHOSE LAND? is a sequel to STRUGGLE FOR THE HOLY ARABS, JEWS AND THE CREATION OF ISRAEL. This volume and the three that will follow it will all explore the rises of the three great religious pillars of Judaism, Christianity and Islam and religious as well as political linkage to the Great Empires. Volume One, entitled JUDAISM, CHRISTIANITY, THE THREE PILLARS OF MONOTHEISM looks at these religions in their embryonic stages and examines how they developed.
author: William Hare
